name: test_post_body_negative[cluster_POST_negative_Invalid field types and values]
description:
Negative cases of request body testing
    Includes sets of invalid field values - out of boundary values,
    nullable and required if not possible, fields with incorrect types etc.
descriptionHtml:
Negative cases of request body testing
Includes sets of invalid field values - out of boundary values,
nullable and required if not possible, fields with incorrect types etc.

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.value: <Endpoints.Cluster: Endpoint(path='cluster', methods=[<Methods.GET: Method(function=<function get at 0x7fc86ac56a60>, url_template='/{name}/{id}/', default_success_code=<HTTPStatus.OK: 200>)>, <Methods.LIST: Method(function=<function get at 0x7fc86ac56a60>, url_template='/{name}/', default_success_code=<HTTPStatus.OK: 200>)>, <Methods.POST: Method(function=<function post at 0x7fc86ac56c10>, url_template='/{name}/', default_success_code=<HTTPStatus.CREATED: 201>)>], data_class=<class 'tests.utils.data_classes.ClusterFields'>)>

testStage.description:
Negative cases of request body testing
    Includes sets of invalid field values - out of boundary values,
    nullable and required if not possible, fields with incorrect types etc.

steps.name: Assert - All fields without body checks - Special values: description, name
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>
Assert - description: ['The description may not be greater than 2000 characters.']
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>

parameters.name: expected_body
parameters.value: {'description': ['The description may not be greater than 2000 characters.']}

steps.name: Assert - name: ['The name may not be greater than 255 characters.']
Response status code should be equal <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY: 422>

parameters.name: expected_body
parameters.value: {'name': ['The name may not be greater than 255 characters.']}
